actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the deferral and cancellation of students loans for the performance of drug prevention and treatment services.
short_title: Drug Abuse Prevention and Intervention Professionals Education Act of 1990
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Drug Abuse Prevention and Intervention Professionals Education Act of 1990 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the deferment of guaranteed and insured student loans, and the cancellation of direct student loans, for the performance of drug prevention and treatment services.

titles.title: Drug Abuse Prevention and Intervention Professionals Education Act of 1990
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the deferral and cancellation of students loans for the performance of drug prevention and treatment services.
